title: Retirement Advisor: A More Ideal Retirement
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: In research on the end-of-life regrets of elderly Americans, the trip they did not take was one of the highest-ranked items. This podcast (5:34) suggests the extra time in quarantine with those closest to us can guide us to how we can achieve a more ideal retirement, one that more precisely defines which pursuits generate the greatest “happiness” returns.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
